text: Kathryn Joosten (December 20, 1939 â€“ June 2, 2012)Telegraph obituary was an American television and voice actress. She was born in Chicago, Illinois. She won two Emmy Awards. She died of lung cancer in Westlake Village, California.Kathryn Joosten of 'Desperate Housewives' dies at 72 ==Filmography== * 1996: Murphy Brown as Secretary #83 * 2005-2012: Desperate Housewives as Karen McCluskey * 2009: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel as Aunt Jackie ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Kathryn Joosten
